00007 string YardVendType::ToString(const string& delim, bool quote) const {
00008     
00009     stringstream output;
00010     char q = '\'';
00011     
00012     output << GetId() << delim 
00013         << q << GetName() << q << delim 
00014         << q << GetAddress() << q << delim 
00015         << q << GetCity() << q << delim 
00016         << q << GetState() << q << delim 
00017         << q << GetZip() << q << delim 
00018         << q << GetPhone() << q << delim 
00019         << q << GetSalesRep() << q << delim 
00020         << q << GetSpecialty() << q << delim
00021         << q << GetEmail() << q << delim
00022         << q << GetHomePage() << q;
00023     
00024     return output.str();
00025         
00026 }
